title: J. Smith-Cameron
itunes:title: J. Smith-Cameron
description:
Host Roger Bennett is joined by J. Smith-Cameron, who plays Gerri Kellman, Waystar Royco’s General Counsel, the smartest person in the room and a true boss in a sea of manboys. Smith-Cameron talks Gerri as a strong, empowering female role, her ability to steal a scene with a side-eye or smirk, and the origin of the term "slime puppy." 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
